import axios from 'axios'; import { Formik, useFormik } from 'formik' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router'; const CreateTournament = () => { const data = new FormData(); const history = useHistory(); const [tournamentPic, settournamentPic] = useState(null) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { nameTournament: '', dateTournament: '', gameOfTournament: '', numberOfPlayers: '', price: '' }, onSubmit: values => { data.append('IGN', values.IGN); data.append('userName', values.userName); data.append('userPrenom', values.userPrenom); data.append('userDate', values.userDate); data.append('userPassword', values.userPassword) data.append('userEmail', values.userEmail); data.append('age', values.age) data.append('tournamentPic', tournamentPic) console.log(tournamentPic) axios.post('http://localhost:5000/user/add', data) .then((res) => { console.log(res) history.push('/signin') }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, }); return ( < div style={{ backgroundImage: `url( ${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/images/thumb-1920-406809.jpg)`, backgroundSize: `cover`, } }>

Register Now

{ settournamentPic(e.target.files[0]) }} />
) } export default CreateTournament
